SEARCH
Module iu.util.logging
Package iu.logging.boot

Class IuLogManager

java.lang.Object
java.util.logging.LogManager
iu.logging.boot.IuLogManager
public class IuLogManager extends LogManager
May be used to restrict access to configuration methods to IuLoggingBootstrap and its implementation module.

Use -Djava.util.logging.manager=iu.logging.boot.IuLogManager to enable.

  • Method Details

    • bound

      static void bound(edu.iu.UnsafeRunnable task) throws Throwable
      Binds a configuration task to the current thread, allowing temporary access to use logging configuration methods.
      Parameters:
      task - task to run with configuration methods enabled.
      Throws:
      Throwable - From UnsafeRunnable.run()

    • readonly

      static UnsupportedOperationException readonly()
      Generates an error indicating that log configuration is read-only.
      Returns:
      UnsupportedOperationException

    • checkReadonly

      static void checkReadonly()
      Checks if the current thread is bound to a configuration task.
